        @PreAuthorize("hasAnyAuthority(\'SYS_ADMIN\', \'TENANT_ADMIN\', \'CUSTOMER_USER\')")
@RequestMapping(value="/relation",
                method=POST)
@ResponseStatus(OK)

        @PreAuthorize("hasAnyAuthority(\'SYS_ADMIN\', \'TENANT_ADMIN\', \'CUSTOMER_USER\')")
@RequestMapping(value="/relation",

@ResponseStatus(OK)
public void deleteRelation​(@RequestParam("fromId")
